benchmark_details.name: Rosetta-PL
benchmark_details.overview: Rosetta-PL is a benchmark designed to evaluate LLMsâ€™ logical reasoning and generalization capabilities in a controlled environment.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the logical accuracy and pattern recognition capabilities of LLMs in a newly created propositional language.

data.source: Derived from the Lean Workbook dataset.
data.annotation: Translated logical propositions into a custom propositional language.

methods: Evaluation on seen and unseen datasets
methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated as number of correctly answered queries divided by total number of queries.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better logical reasoning capabilities of the model.
